title: Do any champions in this game take skill?
body: I have a feeling that besides maybe 1-3 champs everyone has the opinion that no champ takes skill.

replies.body: Lots of champions take skill take xerath total skillshot based champion

if you can land skillshots
His hitboxes are both very large, and broken. Also his cooldowns are so short it doesnt even matter. lastly firing that q into 5 people its gonna chunk at least 2 of them for half their HP.

Most faceroll champs actually do, if you're playing them outside of Silver/Bronze bracket, as it's stomp or be stomped there for the most part. And the huge list of champ outside of pure meta.

The champs people always say that have skills only consists of skills in learning their kits and not much else, that's not what I would actually call "Skill".

pretty diverse champions imo but the skill cap of champions is reflected on the outplay potential not how over powered they are, i see it constantly, riven stomps lane gets told hes bad and to play a hard champ, same person plays exact same champ gets rolled, people who say the champ that your using takes no skill are usual just mad and reassuring themselves that they themselves aren't bad

Moredekaiser, really %%%%ing hard to learn, timing so you don't almost kill yourself, making sure they're in range of his E (i think, the maces from the ground) ensuring there are other people nearby for Q to bounce

Brand low skill level to play (if you can land his stun) and ensuring the combo works perfectly to get the most out of blaze

In my opinion every champion takes skill however I feel that different champions take different kinds of skill and that the skill level of those around you also influences the amount of skill required. Arguably my best champs are Quinn, Maokai and Kalista and that's based on the way I play and my skill in the game, even affected by the skill of those around me (For example when I play Kal it's usually duo bot with a friend).

You probably won't take me seriously, but this is what I BELIEVE, so imo

90% of champions take skill

I'd also consider yi takes skill
